name: straight ahead mittens
notes:
simple, quick and cozy mittens, fingerless mittens or wrist warmers.
just knit straight ahead.

**sizes**
women’s small (medium, large/men’s small)

to fit a hand circumference of 18 (19, 21) cm / 7 (7.5, 8.25)“
no to slight positive ease is recommended.

**yarn**
50 (50, 100) g of worsted weight yarn.

pattern uses viking eco highland wool (110 m / 120 yards per 50 g, 100% wool).

given yardage is for full mittens.

**gauge**
19 sts and 29 rnds = 10 cm / 4" in stockinette after blocking. 

**needles**
4 mm (us 6) double pointed needles.

or size needed to obtain gauge.

**other materials**
tapestry needle

**techniques you are already familiar with**
stretchy co method of choice (e.g. old norwegian cast-on)
knitting
purling
putting stitches on hold
backwards loop cast-on
picking up stitches
decreases (k2tog)

i hope you will enjoy knitting this pattern as much as i have making it. i would love to see your projects! make sure to tag me on instagram @tinge.knits with #straightaheadmitts.

*pattern has been test knit.*
